errors.name: InvalidCollateralMintOrIdentifier
errors.msg: The collateral mint specified does not match identifier according to type

errors.name: MaintanenceCollateralNotMet
errors.msg: Loan doesnt have enough collateral for maintenance

errors.name: PartialWithdrawsNotAllowedForOrcaPositions
errors.msg: Partial withdraws not allowed for orca positions

errors.name: InvalidLedgerStatusForLedgerSale
errors.msg: Invalid ledger status for ledger sale

errors.name: LoanSizeExceedsMaxOriginationSize
errors.msg: Loan size exceeds max origination size

errors.name: PriceUncertainityExceeded
errors.msg: Price uncertainilty is more than max uncertainity

errors.name: MissingMarketInformationAccount
errors.msg: Missing Oracle Information account in remaining accounts

errors.name: MissingOracleAccount
errors.msg: Missing Oracle account in remaining accounts

errors.name: LSTOraclePriceNotFound
errors.msg: Could not get price per LST

errors.name: InvalidDecimal
errors.msg: value could not be converted to Decimal

errors.name: InvalidConversionOracleQuote
errors.msg: Invalid quote mint for conversion oracle

errors.name: NotEnoughRemainingAccounts
errors.msg: Not enough remaining accounts passed in. Each lockbox asset requires at least 2 remaining accounts

errors.name: InvalidQuoteMintForMeteoraVault
errors.msg: Invalid quote mint for vault oracle. Must be the same as vault base token

errors.name: InvalidBaseMintForMeteoraVault
errors.msg: Invalid base mint for vault oracle. Must be the same as vault LP token

errors.name: InvalidDecimalsForMeteoraVault
errors.msg: Invalid decimals for vault oracle. Must be the same as vault LP token

errors.name: MeteoraVaultTotalAmountErr
errors.msg: Could not calculate total amount for meteroa vault

errors.name: TickArrayDoesNotMatchWhirlpool
errors.msg: Tick array does not match whirlpool

errors.name: PriceNotFound
errors.msg: Quote price not found in cache

errors.name: DuplicateCollateralMintsInMarketInformation
errors.msg: Duplicate collateral mints in market information

errors.name: AssetNotFoundInMarketInformation
errors.msg: Asset not found in market information

errors.name: InvalidInterestPerSecondForClose
errors.msg: Invalid interest per second. Must be 0

errors.name: InvalidExternalYieldAmountForClose
errors.msg: Invalid external yield amount. Must be 0

errors.name: InvalidCurrentDeployedAmountForClose
errors.msg: Invalid current deployed amount. Must be 0

errors.name: InvalidStartTime
errors.msg: Invalid start time. Loan start time must be within 5 minutes of current time

errors.name: InvalidCollateralWithdrawalWeightMatrixAssignment
errors.msg: Invalid collateral withdrawal weight matrix assignment

errors.name: InvalidPrincipalWithdrawalWeightMatrixAssignment
errors.msg: Invalid principal withdrawal weight matrix assignment

errors.name: LedgerInRefinanceGracePeriodCannotBeWithdrawn
errors.msg: Ledger in refinance grace period cannot be withdrawn

errors.name: OnlyBorrowerCanRefinanceBeforeEnd
errors.msg: Only borrower can refinance before end

errors.name: LoanNotFullyRepaid
errors.msg: Loan has not been fully repaid

errors.name: InvalidLiquidationThreshold
errors.msg: Liquidation threshold must be >= ltv + buffer

errors.name: LQTWeightedCollateralValueGreaterThanTotalDebt
errors.msg: LQT weighted collateral value is greater than total debt

types.name: BorrowPrincipalParams
docs:
Remaining accounts:

num ledgers = L

 1. LTV Write:
    0: Ledger[ledger_index] Market Information

 2. Healthcheck:
    For each ledger:
    Ledger market information
    Principal oracle accounts + conversion oracle accounts
    Then for each collateral in the loan:
    Collateral oracle accounts + conversion oracle accounts

Asset index guidance:

1. LTV write:
   For ledger[ledger_index]:
    Collateral index for each collateral
2. Healthcheck:
    For each ledger:
        For each collateral in the loan:
            Principal index
            Collateral index

types.name: CreateLoanParams
docs:
Remaining accounts:


1. LTV Write:
    0: Ledger Market Information

2. Healthcheck:
    Principal oracle accounts + conversion oracle accounts
    Collateral oracle accounts + conversion oracle accounts


Asset index guidance:
1. LTV write:
   For ledger[ledger_index]:
    Collateral index for each collateral
2. Healthcheck: -> don't need market information for healthcheck. Market information is already loaded in the accounts.
    Principal index
    Collateral index

types.name: DepositCollateralParams
docs:
Remaining accounts:

num ledgers = L

1. LTV Write:
    0 -> (L-1): Ledger Market Information

Asset index guidance:
1. LTV Write:
    0 -> (L-1): Collateral index for deposited collateral on the ledger market information

types.name: PodBool
docs: Represents a bool stored as a byte

types.name: PodDecimal
docs: this is the scaled representation of a whole number. The whole number is scaled by 10^18 to avoid floating point errors when performing arithmetic operations.

types.name: PodU128
docs: Represents a 128-bit unsigned integer stored as bytes (little-endian)

types.name: PodU16
docs: Represents a 16-bit unsigned integer stored as bytes (little-endian)

types.name: PodU32
docs: Represents a 32-bit unsigned integer stored as bytes (little-endian)

types.name: PodU32CBPS
docs: helper type to store u32 cbps values

types.name: PodU64
docs: Represents a 64-bit unsigned integer stored as bytes (little-endian)

types.name: PodU64CBPS
docs: helper type to store u64 cbps values

types.name: RepayPrincipalParams
docs: No remaining accounts or asset index guidance needed. In full repayment, we zero out the matrix for the specific ledger using default loan values.

fields.name: last_accrued_timestamp
docs: timestamp interest per second's interest was last accrued

fields.name: liquidity_buffer
docs: the is the amount of liquidity % that always needs to be in the strategy

fields.name: token_balance
docs: amount of principal in the strategy

fields.name: interest_fee
docs: this is the fee charged by and accrued to the manager on the interest accrued via external yield and loans

fields.name: principal_fee
docs: this is the fee charged by and accrued to the manager on the origination fee

fields.name: origination_fee
docs: fee charged on origination of new loans

fields.name: origination_cap
docs: the maximum size of a loan that can be originated

fields.name: external_yield_amount
docs: this is the amount of principal currently in external yield. has to always be updated on any new nav action

fields.name: current_deployed_amount
docs: this is the amount of principal currently deployed in loans

fields.name: outstanding_interest_amount
docs: this is the interest that has not been repaid yet but accrued

fields.name: fee_claimable
docs: this is the amount that has accrued to the manager

types.name: WhirlpoolRewardInfo
docs: Stores the state relevant for tracking liquidity mining rewards at the `Whirlpool` level.
These values are used in conjunction with `PositionRewardInfo`, `Tick.reward_growths_outside`,
and `Whirlpool.reward_last_updated_timestamp` to determine how many rewards are earned by open

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority account that has permission to initialize the reward and set emissions.

fields.name: emissions_per_second_x64
docs: Q64.64 number that indicates how many tokens per second are earned per unit of liquidity.

fields.name: growth_global_x64
docs: Q64.64 number that tracks the total tokens earned per unit of liquidity since the reward

types.name: WithdrawCollateralParams
docs:
Remaining accounts:

num ledgers = L

1. 0 -> 2L-1: Strategy + MarketInformation for ledger L_i

2. Healthcheck:
    For each ledger:
    Ledger market information
    Principal oracle accounts + conversion oracle accounts
    Then again for each ledger and collateral:
        Collateral oracle accounts + conversion oracle accounts


Asset index guidance:
1. Healthcheck:
    For each ledger:
        For each collateral in the loan:
            Principal index
            Collateral index
